Table of Contents

Interface IManager<T, TService>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.Controller.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.Controller.dll

Base manager interface for all models.

Inheritance: IManager<T, TService>
Implementations: BaseManager<T, TService>, RelativeFileManager<T, TService>, IgnoredFileManager, MainDirectoryManager, MenuActionManager, MergedFileManager, SelectedFileManager, UserManager 

public interface IManager<T, TService> where T : IItem where TService : IService<T>

Type Parameters

T

Type of model.

TService

Type of service handling collection of specified models.

Properties

SelectedItem

The identifier of the element of the service's collection that was last selected by one of the manager's methods.

int SelectedItem { get; }

Property Value

int

By default it is set to -1, before any item is selected.

See Also
IService<T>

RelativeFileManager<T, TService>
IgnoredFileManager
MainDirectoryManager
MenuActionManager
MergedFileManager
SelectedFileManager
UserManager
IItem

Service

Service handling collection of objects implementing model associated with this manager.

TService Service { get; }

Property Value

TService

The appropriate service. Service object is created in constructor.

Display()

Displays information about the currently selected item.

void Display()

SelectedFileManager
UserManager
IItem

Select(int)

Selects the item from service's collection.

void Select(int connectedItemId)

Parameters

connectedItemId int

If model supported by this manager is connected with another model, it is the identifier of appropriate connected object. Otherwise parameter's value doesn't matter.

Remarks

Asks user for appropriate data and selects the item (sets SelectedItem value) based on the input.
